video.title: Wolfblood
video.synopsis: This supernatural drama series follows a teenage girl who has the powers of a werewolf: heightened senses and super strength and speed.

episodes.synopsis: Maddy has a secret: She can transform into a wolf. But her world gets even stranger when a boy with the same ability moves into her neighborhood.
episodes.title: Lone Wolf

episodes.synopsis: Determined to find proof of wolfbloods, Tom and Shannon go on a beast hunt, just as Rhydian and Maddy learn that there are wolfbloods who roam wild.
episodes.title: Mysterious Developments

episodes.synopsis: A school art exhibit with the theme of family brings out discussions about several strained relationships -- and ends in the exhibit being vandalized.
episodes.title: Family Ties

episodes.synopsis: Under the pressure of exams, not to mention the anticipation of her first change, Maddy's secret is becoming more and more difficult to contain.
episodes.title: Cry Wolf

episodes.synopsis: On an overnight school trip to the historic isle of Lindesfarne, Maddy and Rhydian might be forced to transform while they are far from home.
episodes.title: Occam's Razor

episodes.synopsis: Still energized by her transformation, Maddy decides to adopt a new identity, with an entirely different look and a whole other set of friends.
episodes.title: Maddy Cool

episodes.synopsis: On the day of the dark moon, Maddy and Rhydian's wolfblood powers are completely drained. In biology class, Shannon tries to analyze Maddy's blood.
episodes.title: Dark Moon

episodes.synopsis: Shannon suspects wolfbloods are to blame for the animals that have been disappearing around town, so she invites Maddy, Tom and Rhydian on a hunt.
episodes.title: Wolfsbane

episodes.synopsis: Rhydian gets in trouble with the law when he sniffs out a box of expensive clothes and distributes them to his friends as gifts.
episodes.title: A Quiet Night In

episodes.synopsis: When Rhydian meets a homeless, wild wolfblood who introduces him to new powers he never realized he had, he is forced to make a difficult choice.
episodes.title: The Call of the Wild

episodes.synopsis: When Rhydian shares his knowledge of Eolas to Maddy, she becomes addicted to using her new abilities and is soon forbidden from seeing Rhydian.
episodes.title: Eolas

episodes.synopsis: Maddy and Rhydian trick their way into running wild outside of the den. Meanwhile, Shannon meets a handsome beast tracker and joins him on a hunt.
episodes.title: Caged

episodes.synopsis: Though she ultimately intends to find protection for the wolves, Shannon gets in over her head when she tries to prove their existence.
episodes.title: Irresistable

episodes.synopsis: Rhydian unexpectedly returns to Stoneybridge, chased by Alric and two of his beta wolves, Arran and Meinir. This puts Maddy and her family in danger.
episodes.title: Leader of the Pack

episodes.synopsis: An unexpected arrival puts the wolfbloods in jeopardy and Maddy must choose sides.
episodes.title: The Girl from Nowhere

episodes.synopsis: A forensic scientist is about to uncover the Wolfblood secret after Liam's father ploughs up an old skeleton.
episodes.title: Grave Consequences

episodes.synopsis: A lunar eclipse gives the wolfbloods a chance to experience something new, and Shannon reveals a hidden talent.
episodes.title: Total Eclipse of the Moon

episodes.synopsis: Alric returns with an ultimatum for Jana, and Rhydian has a choice to make.
episodes.title: Ancient Grudge

episodes.synopsis: Maddy, Emma, Daniel, Tom and Shannon are lured to a creepy old house. Rhydian learns something new about Jana.
episodes.title: The Mottled Poppy

episodes.synopsis: The feuds within the pack escalate when student elections are held, putting them all at risk.
episodes.title: Top Dog

episodes.synopsis: Jana is after Shannon's computer, and Maddy must decide where her best interests lie.
episodes.title: Desperate Measures

episodes.synopsis: Maddy blames herself for Shannon's depression and hopes to makes things right at Kara's school disco, which is being held on a no-moon night.
episodes.title: Dances with Wolfbloods

episodes.synopsis: On an orienteering trip, Liam, Maddy and Rhydian go looking for an old "werewolf" lair.
episodes.title: Fall of the Wild

episodes.synopsis: Ceri unexpectedly turns up at the caravan with extraordinary news for Jana.
episodes.title: The Best of Both Worlds

episodes.synopsis: Alric comes looking for revenge and Liam goes back into the tunnels with Jimi and Sam.
episodes.title: Going Underground

episodes.synopsis: The world closes in on the Wolfblood secret. Could this be the end for the pack?
episodes.title: The Discovery

episodes.synopsis: A Wolfblood recruiting for the Segolia Corporation tells Rhydian a shocking secret. He, Shannon and Tom must face a new future -- and an old foe.
episodes.title: Ulterior Motives

episodes.synopsis: An unexpected arrival puts Rhydian's leadership skills to the test as events force him to choose between life and death.
episodes.title: Alpha Material

episodes.synopsis: When Tom and Rhydian forage for food, Tom is accused of poaching, so Shannon offers an alibi that forces her and Tom to pretend they are dating.
episodes.title: With Friends Like These

episodes.synopsis: Rhydian's father appears seeking reunion and forgiveness -- or so it appears. Dacia seems unusually interested in him and the wild Wolfbloods.
episodes.title: Wolfblood Is Thicker Than Water

episodes.synopsis: Conflicts are ignited when some ancient Wolfblood relics are discovered; Tom finds a kindred spirit in Kay, and the sparks start to fly.
episodes.title: The Dark Ages

episodes.synopsis: When Jana is lost without her pack under a full moon, her inner wolf becomes a morwal -- a bitter, angry beast with a savage instinct to attack.
episodes.title: Who's Afraid of the Big Bad Wolf

episodes.synopsis: Rhydian and Jana search for an abandoned Wolfblood cave; Shannon gets sponsored by Segolia to follow her dream; Tom faces the wrath of the K's.
episodes.title: Wolves Among Us

episodes.synopsis: Rhydian and Jana mysteriously collapse as a comet appears during the dark of the moon, and only Shannon can possibly save the day.
episodes.title: Dark of the Rune

episodes.synopsis: Jana, Tom and Shannon travel to Segolia, where Tom makes a mysterious and terrifying discovery that alters the course of his life.
episodes.title: The Cure

episodes.synopsis: When someone tampers with a serum Tom ingests, he acts out in dangerous ways, prompting Rhydian, Shannon and Jana turn to Segolia for help.
episodes.title: The Cult of Tom

episodes.synopsis: When Tom's odd behavior piques his former teacher's curiosity, Mr. Jeffries follows Tom and his friends and witnesses more than he bargained for.
episodes.title: The Suspicions of Mr. Jeffries

episodes.synopsis: As the net closes in on Gerwyn, he learns about the motives behind Sweeney's actions and the identity of the real enemy.
episodes.title: Cerberus

episodes.synopsis: The wolfbloods face their toughest challenge yet when confronted with Kincaid's monstrous plan to eradicate their species.
episodes.title: Moonrise
